website_summaries.verdict: An attractive price for a multi-knife set, these knives also have very effective sharpening sheathes.
pros: This set has 9 pieces in all, including 4 knives with sheathes and a cutting board
The sheathes auto-sharpen the knives when you remove or replace them
Good look, and a decent price for a set
Cutting board is 10" x 13" and non-slip
cons: Cutting board is on the flimsy side
Some found the knife grips to be awkward, while others say that the knives start to rust fairly quickly

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and useful
customer_reviews.text: These were a present for my daughter who enjoys cooking and making new recipes. She really likes the sharpness and the covers for the knives. Good price for a nice present.
customer_reviews.author: MLG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these knives. For once I always have sharp knives!
customer_reviews.author: J. A. Levin-Arroyo

customer_reviews.title: REO self sharpening knives
customer_reviews.text: Great set of knives. I loved it so much that I got 4 more for my children!
customer_reviews.author: Jimbo

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic knife set for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding knife set! Super-sharp with excellent balance...Worth more than twice the price!
customer_reviews.author: Judd Hark

customer_reviews.title: Love these , the look, and performance is fantastic !!! Plus that you get a cutting board with it is just and xtra bonus !!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are great knives , the fact that they sharpen themselves is awesome !!! I had a little trouble at first because I didn't know you have to slide the knife back and forth in the holder to sharpen it , I was just pushing it back in one way ......straight in .....You must push it back and forth to sharpen it if it becomes a little dull.
customer_reviews.author: L.Q. Greece , NY

customer_reviews.title: Great set of knives
customer_reviews.text: Great set of knives, arrived quickly. It is so nice to actually cut something, my other knives just ripped things because they were so dull. Goes back into the sleeve nicely, would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: KMS

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: love it- nice sharp knives and fingers protected as i reach in the utensil drawer. It states there are 9 pieces- but I count 8(4 knives 4 covers)....unless they were counting the flimsy plastic tray the knives were taped to.
customer_reviews.author: Carol W

customer_reviews.title: Love the idea of this
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of this, and the knives are sharp. However, after only a couple weeks of use the knives are starting to rust. Not cool
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these knives! They stay sharp and with the guards are very nice to keep in a drawer. You don't have to worry about cutting yourself when reaching into the drawer! They cut very well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Noble

customer_reviews.title: The grip on these is pretty awkward. For general info
customer_reviews.text: The grip on these is pretty awkward. For general info, 9 pieces is 4 knives, 4 sheethes and a cutting board.
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: These knives are really good and stay sharp. I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Patti Van Matre

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful knives!!!
customer_reviews.text: Gave them to my daughter and she loves them. Am very happy about buying them for her.
customer_reviews.author: Mackye Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love these knives
customer_reviews.text: Love these knives, they are so sharp and stay sharp with the self sharpening holders. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my daughter and she really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: REO 9-Piece Self-Sharpening Cutlery Set with Cutting Board
feature_bullets: Reo EdgeKeeper Knives feature a sheath with innovated technology that is designed to automatically sharpen the blade with each use
The EdgeKeeper protective sheath contains a built-in mechanism that hones the blade before and after each use, maintaining a blade's razor-sharp edge
This set includes an 8-inch chef's knife, 7-inch santuko knife, 5-inch utility knife, and a 3-inch paring knife; each knife has a shelf-sharpening sheath
Also included is a 10-inch by 13-inch non-slip cutting board with a patented 'Chop N' Slide' ramp for easy food transfer
Knives are hand-wash only with warm, soapy water and dry immediately

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars16 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
